review: I'm a Vegetarian who needs more iron. Made me feel much better after several months. I eat mostly grain based foods.
After a day of hard work I was so tired I could hardly walk. My Doctor told me to start using Iron. I did and now my energy level is great.
I have iron deficiency anemia and have taken supplemental ferrous gluconate 240 mg for a couple of months and it has helped to raise my iron level in my blood.
